item.title: 高盛和花旗认为南非正等待出台债务规则
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，南非财政部长本周在预算案中不太可能正式采用财政锚机制，而是选择至少等到10月再推出这项旨在遏制公共债务的规则。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister is unlikely to formally adopt a fiscal anchor in this week’s budget, opting to wait until at least October to introduce the rule aimed at curbing public debt, according to a Bloomberg poll.】

item.title: 尼日利亚即将实施2020年以来最大幅度的降息：决策指南
item.description: 尼日利亚央行将于周二重启宽松政策，实施自2020年以来最大幅度的降息。随着奈拉汇率走强、通胀率回落以及外汇储备持续增长，政策制定者获得了提振经济增长的空间。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank is set to resume easing with its largest interest-rate cut since 2020 on Tuesday, as a stronger naira, moderating inflation and rising foreign-exchange reserves give policymakers room to shore up economic growth.】

item.title: 马什考虑出售PCS业务，为亚洲超级富豪提供财务风险管理服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马什集团正考虑出售其面向亚洲高净值人士的金融风险管理及人寿保险经纪业务。【原文：Marsh is exploring a sale of its financial risk manager and life insurance broker for high-net-worth individuals in Asia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谨慎的外国投资者正准确把握印度股市投资时机
item.description: 自2025年1月以来，散户投资者最青睐的股票中位数下跌幅度达20%。【原文：Retail investors’ favorite stocks are down a median 20% since January 2025.】

item.title: 铜价飙升，中国交易商看好美国关税下调前景
item.description: 基本金属价格上涨，因中国市场在农历新年假期后重新开放，且该国可能面临美国降低关税的局面。【原文：Base metals gained as China’s markets reopened after the Lunar New Year break, with the country potentially facing lower US tariffs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房地产公司因员工重返办公室而受到提振
item.description: 据彭博智库分析，随着员工返岗频率高于规定要求，澳大利亚两大城市的写字楼业主有望从中获益。【原文：Office landlords in Australia’s two biggest cities stand to gain as workers return to the office more often than required, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 《Citrini报告》作者在恐慌性抛售后呼吁征收人工智能税
item.description: 据Citrini Research报告合著者阿拉普·沙阿称，各国政府应考虑对人工智能征税，以缓冲大规模失业带来的冲击。该报告曾警示技术颠覆风险，并引发了人工智能恐慌性抛售。【原文：Governments should consider taxing artificial intelligence to cushion the effects of sweeping job losses, according to Alap Shah, co-author of a Citrini Research report that warned about tech disruption and fueled an AI scare trade.】

item.title: 简街公司因内幕交易遭Terraform管理方起诉
item.description: 简街集团（Jane Street Group LLC）因涉嫌内幕交易被Terraform Labs清算管理人起诉。这家加密货币公司2022年崩盘导致400亿美元蒸发，引发加密货币市场动荡，并加剧了FTX交易所的崩盘。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC was sued for alleged insider trading by the administrator winding up the affairs of Terraform Labs, the firm whose $40 billion collapse in 2022 roiled the crypto markets and contributed to the collapse of FTX.】

item.title: 日本警告：关税行动后勿倒退贸易协议
item.description: 日本经济产业大臣赤泽凉生在与美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克通电话时警告，任何关税举措都可能使日本陷入比去年达成的日美贸易协定更不利的境地。此番表态正值新一轮美国关税即将生效之际。【原文：Japanese Trade Minister Ryosei Akazawa warned against any tariff moves that could leave Japan worse off than under a Japan-U.S. trade deal agreed to last year, during a phone call with U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick as a new round of U.S. tariffs is set to take effect.】

item.title: 香港财政赤字时代即将终结 但谨慎态度仍占上风
item.description: 对于一个即将结束二十年来最长预算赤字周期的城市而言，香港目前仍未充满信心。【原文：For a city on the cusp of ending its longest run of budget deficits in two decades, Hong Kong isn’t brimming with confidence just yet.】

item.title: 花旗称若卢比升值 印度或购美元充实储备
item.description: 花旗集团印度市场负责人表示，一旦卢比兑美元汇率升至88-89区间，印度央行很可能开始购入美元以充实外汇储备。【原文：India’s central bank is likely to start buying dollars to bolster its foreign-exchange reserves once the rupee strengthens to around 88—89 per dollar, according to Citigroup Inc.’s local markets head.】

item.title: 优步收购停车应用SpotHero以扩大用户群
item.description: 优步科技公司正收购停车预订应用SpotHero公司，这是这家网约车公司为扩大客户群所采取的最新举措。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is buying parking reservation app SpotHero Inc., the latest move by the rideshare company to expand its customer base.】

item.title: 戴蒙将当前形势比作危机前时代，称竞争对手正做"蠢事"
item.description: 摩根大通公司首席执行官杰米·戴蒙在被问及金融业激烈竞争时表示，他开始看到当前形势与2008年金融危机前夕的相似之处——当时的贷款狂潮最终酿成灾难性后果。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon, asked about fierce competition across the financial industry, said he’s starting to see parallels to the era before the 2008 financial crisis, when a rush to make loans ended disastrously.】

item.title: 中国股市重开走高 关税缓解与人工智能热潮助推
item.description: 中国内地股市在经历九天春节假期后开盘走高，市场对美国降低关税的乐观预期以及本土科技股的强劲表现，抵消了近期因人工智能概念引发的华尔街抛售潮。【原文：China’s onshore shares opened higher as traders returned from a nine-day Lunar New Year break, with optimism about lower US tariffs and homegrown technologies offsetting the latest AI-induced selloff on Wall Street.】

item.title: 澳大利亚退休成本飙升，生活开销持续攀升
item.description: 过去六个月间，澳大利亚退休房主的建议储蓄额大幅攀升，生活成本压力加剧了养老金余额的紧缩态势。【原文：The recommended nest egg for retired Australian homeowners has surged in the past six months as cost-of-living pressures add to the squeeze on pension balances.】

item.title: 零售商发现迹象表明英国犯罪浪潮终于开始减缓
item.description: 最新数据显示，英国零售业员工遭遇暴力和虐待的事件在疫情后激增，如今正逐渐趋缓。这得益于安保措施投入的增加以及警方响应能力的提升开始见效。【原文：A post-pandemic spike in violence and abuse against UK retail workers is easing, new data show, as more spending on security measures and improved police responses begin to pay off.】

item.title: Anthropic启动员工股票销售计划，规模最高达60亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Anthropic正向部分现任及前员工提供以约3500亿美元估值出售公司股份的机会——这意味着他们能以近期300亿美元融资时的估值套现。【原文：Anthropic is offering some current and former employees the ability to sell shares in the company at a valuation of about $350 billion, according to people familiar with the matter — allowing them to cash in at the level of a recent $30 billion fundraising.】

item.title: 安盛投资管理时隔数十年首次增持日本债券
item.description: 安盛投资管理公司三十年来首次对日本政府债券表现出兴趣，这家欧洲最大资产管理公司加入了越来越多的外国投资者行列，对日本债务持长期看涨态度。【原文：Amundi is warming to Japanese government bonds for the first time in three decades as Europe’s biggest asset manager joins a growing group of foreign investors taking a long-term bullish view on the nation’s debt.】

item.title: 金价因美国关税不确定性及伊朗紧张局势连续第五日上涨
item.description: 金价连续第五日上涨，因美国贸易政策的不确定性及伊朗局势持续紧张，促使投资者转向更安全的资产。【原文：Gold rose for a fifth day, as uncertainty over US trade policy and prolonged tensions around Iran drove investors toward safer assets.】

item.title: 油价持稳，特朗普重申倾向与伊朗达成协议
item.description: 油价持稳，因美国总统特朗普表示，在本周两国谈判前，他更倾向于与伊朗达成核协议，但他同时警告称，若未能达成协议将面临后果。【原文：Oil steadied as US President Donald Trump said his preference was for a nuclear deal with Iran ahead of talks between the two nations this week, although he warned of consequences if an agreement isn’t reached.】

item.title: 大华银行利润下滑，源于贷款收入与交易业务减少
item.description: 大华银行有限公司公布的第四季度利润略低于分析师预期，原因是贷款收入以及交易和投资收入均出现下滑。【原文：United Overseas Bank Ltd. reported fourth-quarter profit that narrowly missed analyst expectations as income from lending as well as trading and investments declined.】

item.title: SQM-Codelco合资企业锂产量略超预期
item.description: SQM与智利国家铜业公司（Codelco）的锂合作项目去年产出的电池金属略高于预期，随着行业持续摆脱全球供应过剩的困境。【原文：SQM’s lithium partnership with Codelco churned out slightly more of the battery metal than forecast last year as the industry continues to emerge from a global glut.】

item.title: 亚洲股市或跟随美股下行 人工智能担忧情绪蔓延：市场综述
item.description: 周二亚洲股市早盘普遍走低，此前华尔街因人工智能对企业盈利的影响而再度陷入焦虑。美国国债和黄金价格上涨，而比特币价格则大幅下跌。【原文：Most Asian shares were set for early declines Tuesday after fresh anxiety over the impact of artificial intelligence on company profits lashed Wall Street. Treasuries and gold rallied, while Bitcoin slumped.】

item.title: 美联储公布消除银行监管中声誉风险的计划
item.description: 在特朗普总统采取行动遏制其认为因不公正理由关闭客户账户的行为后，美联储公布了一项新提案，进一步规范了监管机构审查银行风险的方式。【原文：The Federal Reserve unveiled a new proposal that further targets how examiners scrutinize banks’ risk after President Donald Trump moved to rein in what he sees as the closing of customer accounts for unfair reasons.】

item.title: 据称KKR支持的Global Medical Response已选定银行为其美国IPO提供服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球医疗响应公司已选定银行为其首次公开募股提供服务。这家由KKR & Co.支持的空中和地面紧急医疗服务公司正加入寻求融资的企业行列，该名单正日益扩大。【原文：Global Medical Response has selected banks for an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, as the KKR & Co.-backed air and ground emergency medical services company joins a growing list of firms seeking to tap investors.】

item.title: 加拿大制药商Apotex计划上半年首次公开募股筹资7.3亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大仿制药制造商Apotex公司计划于上半年在多伦多证券交易所首次公开募股，预计融资规模可达10亿加元（约合7.3亿美元）。【原文：Canadian generic drug manufacturer Apotex Inc. is looking at the first half of the year for an initial public offering in Toronto that could raise as much as C$1 billion ($730 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国消费者信心指数升至三个月高位，芯片需求推动
item.description: 韩国消费者信心指数在2月份攀升至11月以来的最高水平，这得益于强劲的半导体出货量和活跃的国内股市。【原文：South Korea’s consumer confidence climbed in February to its strongest level since November, supported by strong semiconductor shipments and buoyant domestic equity markets.】

item.title: 高盛债券持有人抵制债务回购，标普对评级存疑
item.description: 部分艺电公司债券持有人正联合起来抵制这家游戏制造商的债务回购计划，尽管标普全球评级质疑该举措最终能否为将公司私有化的财团节省资金。【原文：Some of Electronic Arts Inc. bondholders are banding together to fight a debt buyback plan by the video-game maker, even as S&P Global Ratings cast doubt that the maneuver would ultimately save money for the group taking the company private.】

item.title: Coinbase稳定币收入有望激增七倍，BI称
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.一直在华盛顿积极游说，以维持一项关键收入来源。据彭博智库估算，该收入来源未来可能增长至多七倍。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. has been aggressively lobbying in Washington to preserve a key revenue stream that in Bloomberg Intelligence’s estimation could multiply as much as sevenfold.】

item.title: IBM股价创2000年以来最大跌幅，Anthropic力推COBOL现代化
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（IBM）股价周一暴跌，此前人工智能初创公司Anthropic表示，其Claude Code工具可助力现代化COBOL——这种主要运行于IBM计算机上的陈旧编程语言。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. shares plunged on Monday, after the artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said its Claude Code tool can help with modernizing COBOL, a dated programming language that’s mainly run on IBM computers.】
